biotools.summary: virusMS is a database for synthetic peptides of viruses with mass spectrometry. It is a tool for resourcing, annotating, and analysing synthetic peptides of SARS-CoV-2 for immunopeptidomics and other immunological studies.

bioschemas.name: virusMS
bioschemas.summary: virusMS is a database for synthetic peptides of viruses with mass spectrometry. It is a tool for resourcing, annotating, and analysing synthetic peptides of SARS-CoV-2 for immunopeptidomics and other immunological studies.
